attributes.action: Bring back the original Coca-Cola advert for christmas
attributes.additional_details: It's not Christmas without THE Coca-Cola advert
attributes.background: Bring back the Coca-Cola advert with the trucks, last year and this year it has been a different Coca-Cola advert

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about the Coca-Cola advert are a matter for Coca-Cola, not the UK Government or Parliament.
